subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2012)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike Krzyzewski will coach what may be his final international basketball game Sunday, a gold medal rematch between the United States and Spain, and those closest to him will also be in attendance.
snippet: Mike Krzyzewski will coach what may be his final international basketball game Sunday, a gold medal rematch between the United States and Spain, and those closest to him will also be in attendance.
